content.question: A. Describe TWO characteristics of the cultural landscape shown in Image 1. B. Explain how the spread of Buddhism from its culture hearth is an example of expansion diffusion. C. Explain how the global spatial pattern of Islam differs from the global spatial pattern of ethnic religions such as Hinduism. D. Explain a likely cultural effect of pilgrimages on the location shown in Image 1. E. Explain the degree to which religion may contribute to ethnonationalism within the country shown in Image 2.
